alert.note: Alert for Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued November 01 at 6:00PM MDT until November 02 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING EXPIRES AT 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FOR WEDNESDAY NOON TO 6 PM FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FIRE WEATHER ZONES 417, 418, AND 434... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 417, 418, AND 434... The Fire Weather Watch remains in effect Wednesday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 434 in the northern Nebraska Panhandle and Fire weather zones 417 and 418 in east-central Wyoming. * WIND...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph Wednesday. * HUMIDITY...Minimum near 15 percent Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop may spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland
